Text:

It is such a beutiful movie!

I downloaded this last year. I forgot to say thank you, so now I say both: thank you, and sorry for being so late.

zeinabqureshi, I see you made quite a few non-Hollywood, non-mass taste uploads yourself.  Will check them out.
